Well, I think it's important at this stage to still be conservative and remember that while the British media are saying that the police now have got all their men, or at least the four they believe are involved in the July 21st attacks, the police haven't confirmed that there were only four and they haven't attached names to faces and to crimes or at least attempted crimes.
